title: Opinion: Opinion | How Khamenei's Killing Is Doing Exactly The Opposite Of What US-Israel Wanted
summary_full: What Israel and the US have done is make Khamenei, who was running a country dealing with extreme economic hardships, protests and internal strife, a martyr. His killing has united Shias and Sunnis across the globe in anger.
